sentences.en: Anytime they could set up a roadblock in our way.
sentences.cn: 他们随时都可能给我们设置路障.

sentences.en: Call me anytime. I’m always home.
sentences.cn: 随时给我打电话，我一直在家。

sentences.en: Come over anytime you feel like it.
sentences.cn: 你无论什么时候想来都行.

sentences.en: Come to me anytime next week.
sentences.cn: 下星期不论什么时候到我这来吧.
他随时可以给我打电话。

sentences.en: He can leave anytime he wants.
sentences.cn: 他想走的话随时可以走。

sentences.en: I can do better than that anytime.
sentences.cn: 我(如果去做)一定会做得比这更好.

sentences.en: I can do better than this anytime.
sentences.cn: 我一定能比这做得更好.

sentences.en: Indeed, before meeting Robert Kincaid, she would not have dressed this way anytime.
sentences.cn: 说实在的, 在遇到罗伯特.金凯之前她什么时候也不会这样穿法.

sentences.en: Keep the dictionary at your elbow so you can use it for reference anytime.
sentences.cn: 把这本字典留在你手边,以便随时可以参考.

sentences.en: Somehow, we must see each other again. Any place, anytime.
sentences.cn: 不论怎样, 我们必须再见面, 不管是何时何地.

sentences.en: The college admits students anytime during the year.
sentences.cn: 该学院一年中随时招生。

sentences.en: They should arrive anytime between noon and 3 p.m.
sentences.cn: 他们会在中午至下午3点期间到达。

sentences.en: We'll be hearing from him anytime now. "
sentences.cn: 我们现在随时都可能听到他的消息. ”

sentences.en: You can get a job anytime.
sentences.cn: 你无论什么时候都能找到工作.

sentences.en: You can ring us up anytime.
sentences.cn: 你随时都可以给我们打电话。

trans.tran_cn: 任何时候，总是，无例外地，在任何时候
